segments.text: Sally , I ’ m tired of this Western food . I really miss my mother ’ s Sichuan cooking .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m sure you do miss that type of cooking . But can ’ t you try to get used to Western food ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have tried . But Americans like butter , bread , sugar , and cream too much .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I suppose you ’ re right , Lee . Maybe that ’ s why so many Westerners are overweight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s interesting that Americans work very hard at their jobs , do not take naps during the day , and yet they can be so heavy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You see , because we are often busy working , we eat too much fast food , and that food is very fattening .
segments.speaker: S2
